title: PLEASE HELP
content:
Anybody recognise this little beauty!!! Cheers in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191654im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5634.jpg)

 [‹ Salon Product Logos](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191654/http:/typophile.com/node/51321 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID for this script font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191654/http:/typophile.com/node/51305 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ryanharty

comments.content: Is the beauty so little that I cannot even see it?
I of course am being sarcastic... I think you may be familiar with a font named Berk!!!
